mention.text: a spokesman for the miners today reported in lima that peruvian soldiers have arrested at least 22 miners , including 4 regional leaders , on the eve of the miners national strike , which is scheduled to begin on 14 august
the federation of miners and metalworkers
the strike , the first this year
